user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Tom at HopeBridge Foundation (tom@hopebridgefoundation.org) with some insights on assisting refugee students. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Insights on Supporting Refugee Students

Dear Professor Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a chance, could you please compose an email to me (tom@hopebridgefoundation.org) sharing your key insights, recommended practices, and any helpful resources for assisting refugee students? 

Feel free to consult your Notion workspace for any notes or materials that might be useful. Your expertise would be invaluable to our team at HopeBridge Foundation as we work to strengthen our support programs.

Thank you very much for your time and help.

Warm regards,

Tom  
HopeBridge Foundation

final_output:
